definitions.definition: A set of symbols and marks which are used to clarify meaning in text by separating strings of words into clauses , phrases and sentences ; examples include commas, hyphens, and stops (periods).
examples: Different languages have different rules for punctuation .

main_definition: A set of symbols and marks which are used to clarify meaning in text by separating strings of words into clauses , phrases and sentences ; examples include commas, hyphens, and stops (periods).
